title: Why 'Empathy' is a Trigger Word Now
preview: Listen now | Two Conservatives and a Democrat discuss feminism, Christian Nationalists, and why some Republicans now argue that empathy is a sin
body:
[Listen to Episode](https://understandingpolitics.substack.com/p/why-empathy-is-a-trigger-word-now)

Several weeks ago, a Braver Angels volunteer in eastern Washington mentioned that he’d met a friend of mine from Idaho and he wondered whether we’d be interested in having a Braver Angels conversation about Christian Nationalism and regarding his concern around hearing about the word ‘empathy’ having been weaponized.

I’m always interested in good conversation and Kaeley is a wonderful expert, communicator, and friend, so I agreed!

We recorded this toward the end of March and I’ve been hanging on to the audio since then.

Please let me know what you think. Did you enjoy this? Learn something from it? Have a question? Would you like to hear more things like this?

Let me know! This is the first time I’ve ever posted anything like this to my Substack but I do occasionally find myself on podcasts and have considered launching my own.
